/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a corridor that draws the viewer's eye into the image. Red lanterns hang from the trees, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene and casting shadows that add depth to the image.
